Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Boston in 1965...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1966, off Fred Beene (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/1966, off Tom Metcalf (NYY)...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 5/17/1966...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1966, hitting .303 with 29 HR, 114 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Kansas City on 4/8/1967...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1967, hitting .429 with 6 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1968, hitting .429 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1968, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1968, hitting .358 with 5 HR, 34 RBI...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Baltimore on 7/28/1968...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1968, hitting .385 with 5 HR, 23 RBI...
Won World Series with Boston in 1968...
Won MVP Award in 1968, hitting .342 with 30 HR, 139 RBI...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1970, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Boston in 1970...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1970...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Baltimore on 4/16/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1971, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1971...
Injured on 8/26/1973 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1975...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1976...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1977...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/18/1978, off Don Eddy (CHW)...
